title: SU2 Configuration Parameters
description: Complete JSON Schema for SU2 CFD configuration files

KIND_TURB_MODEL.description: Specify turbulence model with complete enumeration. Default: NO_TURB_MODEL

KIND_TRANS_MODEL.description: Specify transition model (options from Trans_Model_Map). Default: NO_TRANS_MODEL:contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4}

RESTART_SOL.description: Restart solution from native solution file

SPECIFIC_HEAT_CP.description: Specific heat at constant pressure for each species. Variable-length array based on number of species.

oneOf.description: Molecular weight for all species (single value applied to all species)
Molecular weight for each species. Variable-length array based on number of species.

GAS_COMPOSITION.description: Gas composition for each species. Variable-length array based on number of species.

INLET_GAS_COMPOSITION.description: Inlet gas composition for each species. Variable-length array based on number of species.

SUPERCATALYTIC_WALL_COMPOSITION.description: Supercatalytic wall composition for each species. Variable-length array based on number of species.

oneOf.description: SU2 option: CONDUCTIVITY_MODEL
SU2 option: CONDUCTIVITY_MODEL (array form)

REYNOLDS_NUMBER.description: Reynolds number (non-dimensional, based on the free-stream values)

oneOf.description: Laminar Prandtl number (single value applied to all species)
Laminar Prandtl number for each species. Variable-length array based on number of species + 1.
Turbulent Prandtl number (single value applied to all species)
Turbulent Prandtl number for each species. Variable-length array based on number of species + 1.

MACH_NUMBER.description: Mach number (non-dimensional, based on the free-stream values)

INIT_OPTION.description: Init option for initializing solution (options from InitOption_Map). Default: REYNOLDS:contentReference[oaicite:17]{index=17}

FREESTREAM_DENSITY.description: Free-stream density (kg/m^3; default -1.0 means calculated from others):contentReference[oaicite:19]{index=19}

oneOf.description: Single X reference origin for moment computation (applied to all markers)
X Reference origin for moment computation. Variable-length array matching number of monitoring markers.
Single Y reference origin for moment computation (applied to all markers)
Y Reference origin for moment computation. Variable-length array matching number of monitoring markers.
Single Z reference origin for moment computation (applied to all markers)
Z Reference origin for moment computation. Variable-length array matching number of monitoring markers.

REF_ELEM_LENGTH.description: Reference element length for slope limiter epsilon:contentReference[oaicite:30]{index=30}

MARKER_CONTROL_VOLUME.description: Surface marker(s) for flow solution in control volume:contentReference[oaicite:36]{index=36}

MARKER_DESIGNING.description: Surface marker(s) where design objective is evaluated:contentReference[oaicite:37]{index=37}

ACTDISK_TYPE.description: Actuator disk boundary type (options from ActDisk_Map). Default: VARIABLES_JUMP:contentReference[oaicite:49]{index=49}

MARKER_ACTDISK.description: Periodic boundary marker(s) for actuator disk (format specific):contentReference[oaicite:50]{index=50}

INLET_TYPE.description: Inlet boundary type (options from Inlet_Map). Default: TOTAL_CONDITIONS:contentReference[oaicite:51]{index=51}

oneOf.description: Single inlet marker definition: [marker_name, total_temperature, total_pressure, flow_dir_x, flow_dir_y, flow_dir_z]
Marker name
Total temperature, total pressure, or flow direction component
Multiple inlet markers, each with definition: [marker_name, total_temperature, total_pressure, flow_dir_x, flow_dir_y, flow_dir_z]
Marker name
Total temperature, total pressure, or flow direction component

MARKER_RIEMANN.description: Riemann boundary markers with specific format and flow direction

MIXING_PROCESS_TYPE.description: Mixing process type for boundary averaging (options from MixingProcess_Map). Default: AREA_AVERAGE:contentReference[oaicite:54]{index=54}

MARKER_MIXINGPLANE.description: Boundary marker(s) where mixing plane is applied:contentReference[oaicite:55]{index=55}

oneOf.description: Single supersonic inlet marker definition: [marker_name, temperature, pressure, velocity_x, velocity_y, velocity_z]
Marker name
Temperature, pressure, or velocity component
Multiple supersonic inlet markers, each with definition: [marker_name, temperature, pressure, velocity_x, velocity_y, velocity_z]
Marker name
Temperature, pressure, or velocity component
Single outlet marker definition with variable number of parameters
Marker name
Pressure or other outlet parameter
Multiple outlet markers, each with variable parameters
Marker name
Pressure or other outlet parameter

MARKER_ISOTHERMAL.description: Isothermal wall markers with format: (marker, temperature, ...)

MARKER_HEATFLUX.description: Heat flux wall markers with format: (marker, heat flux, ...)

ENGINE_INFLOW_TYPE.description: Inflow boundary type for engine (options from Engine_Inflow_Map). Default: FAN_FACE_MACH:contentReference[oaicite:62]{index=62}

LINEAR_SOLVER.description: Linear solver for implicit or mesh systems (options from Linear_Solver_Map). Default: FGMRES:contentReference[oaicite:63]{index=63}

LINEAR_SOLVER_PREC.description: Preconditioner for linear solvers (options from Linear_Solver_Prec_Map). Default: LU_SGS:contentReference[oaicite:64]{index=64}

RESIDUAL_FUNC_FLOW.description: Flow functional for residual criterion (options from Residual_Map). Default: RHO_RESIDUAL:contentReference[oaicite:68]{index=68}

CAUCHY_ELEMS.description: Number of elements for Cauchy criterion. Default: 100:contentReference[oaicite:70]{index=70}

CAUCHY_FUNC_FLOW.description: Flow functional for Cauchy criterion (options from Objective_Map). Default: DRAG_COEFFICIENT:contentReference[oaicite:72]{index=72}

CAUCHY_FUNC_ADJFLOW.description: Adjoint functional for Cauchy criterion (options from Sens_Map). Default: SENS_GEOMETRY:contentReference[oaicite:73]{index=73}

START_UP_ITER.description: Startup iterations using fine grid only. Default: 0:contentReference[oaicite:74]{index=74}

MGCYCLE.description: Multigrid cycle type (options from MG_Cycle_Map). Default: V_CYCLE:contentReference[oaicite:76]{index=76}

oneOf.description: Single multigrid pre-smoothing level
Array of multigrid pre-smoothing levels for each multigrid level

MG_PRE_SMOOTH.description: Multigrid pre-smoothing level (can be integer or array of integers)

oneOf.description: Single multigrid post-smoothing level
Array of multigrid post-smoothing levels for each multigrid level

MG_POST_SMOOTH.description: Multigrid post-smoothing level (can be integer or array of integers)

oneOf.description: Single Jacobi smoothing level for multigrid correction
Array of Jacobi smoothing levels for multigrid correction at each level

MG_CORRECTION_SMOOTH.description: Jacobi smoothing of multigrid correction (can be integer or array of integers)

NUM_METHOD_GRAD.description: Numerical method for spatial gradients (options from Gradient_Map). Default: WEIGHTED_LEAST_SQUARES

NUM_METHOD_GRAD_RECON.description: Numerical method for spatial gradients used only for upwind reconstruction (options from Gradient_Map). Default: NO_GRADIENT

CONV_NUM_METHOD_FLOW.description: Convective numerical method for flow (options from Upwind_Map/Centered_Map):contentReference[oaicite:83]{index=83}

SOLVER.description: SU2 solver type including FEM and discrete adjoint variants

oneOf.description: SU2 option: LM_OPTIONS (single string value)
SU2 option: LM_OPTIONS (array of strings)

HROUGHNESS.description:
KIND_SCALAR_MODEL 
 DESCRIPTION: Specify scalar transport model 
 Options: see \link Scalar_Model_Map \endlink 
 DEFAULT: NONE \ingroup Config

TIME_MARCHING.description: Time marching strategy (options from TimeMarching_Map). Default: STEADY

MESH_FORMAT.description: Mesh input format including geometric primitives

MARKER_ACTDISK_BEM.description: SU2 option: MARKER_ACTDISK_BEM - Actuator disk BEM boundary markers

MARKER_PYTHON.description: SU2 option: MARKER_PYTHON - Python script boundary markers

PYTHON_OPTION.description: SU2 option: PYTHON_OPTION - Python script configuration

MARKER_EXHAUST.description: SU2 option: MARKER_EXHAUST - Exhaust boundary markers

CONVECT_FEM_OPTION.description: SU2 option: CONVECT_FEM_OPTION - Convective FEM method

MARKER_TURBOMACHINERY.description: SU2 option: MARKER_TURBOMACHINERY - Turbomachinery boundary markers

MARKER_GILES.description: SU2 option: MARKER_GILES - Giles boundary condition markers

MARKER_DISPLACEMENT.description: SU2 option: MARKER_DISPLACEMENT - Displacement boundary markers

oneOf.description: Single load marker definition: [marker_name, load_value, load_multiplier, load_dir_x, load_dir_y, load_dir_z]
Marker name
Load value, multiplier, or direction component
Multiple load markers, each with definition: [marker_name, load_value, load_multiplier, load_dir_x, load_dir_y, load_dir_z]
Marker name
Load value, multiplier, or direction component

MARKER_FLOWLOAD.description: SU2 option: MARKER_FLOWLOAD - Flow load boundary markers

CP_POLYCOEFFS.description: Polynomial coefficients for specific heat at constant pressure. Fixed-size array for INC_IDEAL_GAS_POLY fluid model.

MU_POLYCOEFFS.description: Polynomial coefficients for dynamic viscosity. Fixed-size array for polynomial viscosity model.

KT_POLYCOEFFS.description: Polynomial coefficients for thermal conductivity. Fixed-size array for polynomial conductivity model.

JST_SENSOR_COEFF.description: 2nd and 4th order artificial dissipation coefficients for the JST method. Fixed-size array with 2 elements.

ADJ_JST_SENSOR_COEFF.description: 2nd and 4th order artificial dissipation coefficients for the adjoint JST method. Fixed-size array with 2 elements.

GEO_BOUNDS.description: Bounds for geometry evaluation. Fixed-size array with 2 elements [lower_bound, upper_bound].

oneOf.description: Initial value for scalar transport (single value applied to all species)
Initial values for scalar transport. Variable-length array based on number of species.

SPECIES_CLIPPING_MAX.description: Maximum values for species clipping. Variable-length array based on number of species.

SPECIES_CLIPPING_MIN.description: Minimum values for species clipping. Variable-length array based on number of species.

SUBSONIC_ENGINE_VALUES.description: Subsonic engine boundary values. Fixed-size array with 5 elements.

SUBSONIC_ENGINE_CYL.description: Subsonic engine cylinder values. Fixed-size array with 7 elements.

DISTORTION_RACK.description: Distortion rack parameters. Fixed-size array with 2 elements.

NEWTON_KRYLOV_DPARAM.description: Newton-Krylov double parameters. Variable-length array for Newton-Krylov solver parameters.

GILES_EXTRA_RELAXFACTOR.description: Giles boundary condition extra relaxation factor. Fixed-size array with 2 elements.

MIXEDOUT_COEFF.description: Mixed-out boundary condition coefficients. Fixed-size array with 3 elements.

RAMP_ROTATING_FRAME_COEFF.description: Ramp rotating frame coefficients. Fixed-size array with 3 elements.

RAMP_OUTLET_PRESSURE_COEFF.description: Ramp outlet pressure coefficients. Fixed-size array with 3 elements.

SINE_LOAD_COEFF.description: Sine load coefficients. Fixed-size array with 3 elements: [amplitude, frequency, phase_in_radians].

INC_VELOCITY_INIT.description: Initial velocity for incompressible flows. Fixed-size array with 3 components (1.0,0,0 m/s by default)

oneOf.description: Constant Lewis number (single value applied to all species)
Constant Lewis numbers for each species. Variable-length array based on number of species + 1.

FLAME_INIT_METHOD.description: Ignition method for flamelet solver. Default: no ignition; cold flow only.

FLAME_INIT.description: Flame front initialization using the flamelet model. Variable-length array.

SPARK_INIT.description: Spark initialization parameters for flamelet model. Variable-length array.

SPARK_REACTION_RATES.description: Spark reaction rates for flamelet model. Variable-length array.

oneOf.description: Single periodic boundary marker pair: [marker1, marker2, rotcenter_x, rotcenter_y, rotcenter_z, rotangle_x, rotangle_y, rotangle_z, translation_x, translation_y, translation_z]
Marker name
Rotation center, angle, or translation component
Multiple periodic boundary marker pairs
Marker name
Rotation center, angle, or translation component
Single heat transfer marker: [marker_name, heat_transfer_coeff, wall_temperature]
Marker name
Heat transfer coefficient or wall temperature
Multiple heat transfer markers
Marker name
Heat transfer coefficient or wall temperature
Single engine exhaust marker: [marker_name, temperature_target, pressure_target]
Marker name
Temperature or pressure target
Multiple engine exhaust markers
Marker name
Temperature or pressure target
